topics.body:
Some news:
Apparently there's a new Snowden.  What I mean by this is that is the USA government is in a tizzy right now cause there's apparently more of their workers are leaking internal documents.

This is why having big brother is a dumb idea because of "stand alone complex".  What I mean by this is that if you try prosecute people for acting on beliefs that a large chunk of the population believes in that's going to cause other individuals to copy them.

To put it bluntly since Chelsea Manning was prosecuted and Snowden is forced out of the country more they're now "heroes to the people" many of whom work for the NSA.  Having people that work at the NSA who view their actions as heroic means your shit's going to get leaked.

The triumphant overcome
